strategies: Use 'Bento Grid' for the main dashboard layout.
Hero section should use 'The Tracing Beam' or 'Glassmorphism' style.
Tables should be dense but readable with 'JetBrains Mono' for numbers.

cards.classes: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 shadow-2xl rounded-xl

buttons.primary: bg-cyan-500 hover:bg-cyan-400 text-black font-bold rounded-full px-8 py-3 transition-all shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(6,182,212,0.5)] hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(6,182,212,0.7)]
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 hover:bg-white/10 text-white border border-white/10 rounded-full px-6 py-2 backdrop-blur-md

charts.style: Neon lines (stroke-width: 3px) with gradient fills. Hide grid lines or make them very subtle (opacity 0.1). Tooltips should be dark glass.

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle radial gradients in the background to create depth (e.g., a faint cyan glow behind the Bitcoin chart).
visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the background to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.motion: Use Framer Motion for entrance animations (staggered fade-in for list items). Hover states should feel magnetic.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to public/index.html immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the custom colors and font families defined above.
3. GLOBAL STYLES: Update index.css to set the background to #050505 and text to #FAFAFA. Add a noise texture class if possible.
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, override the default 'border-border' with 'border-white/10' for a subtler look.
5. LAYOUT: Implement the Dashboard using the Bento Grid strategy. The Bitcoin Price Chart should be the 'Hero' element (col-span-2 or 3).
6. API: Use CoinGecko API for data. Handle rate limits gracefully (cache data or use a mock fallback if needed).
7. THEME: Force Dark Mode. Do not implement a light mode toggle as the user requested a 'crypto-focused aesthetic' which implies dark mode.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
